testimonials.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonials.text: Capstone Infras transformed our dream home into reality. Their attention to detail and transparency in pricing was unmatched.

testimonials.name: Suresh Reddy
testimonials.text: Professional team with excellent project management skills. The structural audit they performed saved us significant costs.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.text: As an architect, I value structural integrity above all. Capstone's engineering team is the best I've worked with in Andhra Pradesh.

faqs.question: What is the typical timeline for a residential project?
faqs.answer: A standard G+2 residential project typically takes 8-12 months to complete, depending on the complexity and size. We provide a detailed schedule before starting.

faqs.question: Do you provide structural audits for old buildings?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in structural audits and non-destructive testing (NDT) to assess the health of existing structures and recommend retrofitting solutions.

faqs.question: Is your pricing inclusive of materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, our construction packages (Essential, Value Plus, Signature) are all-inclusive, covering materials, labor, and supervision. We ensure complete transparency with no hidden costs.

faqs.question: Are you NABL accredited?
faqs.answer: Yes, our material testing laboratory is NABL accredited, ensuring that all rigorous quality checks meet national and international standards.
